Key Match Events: Mize's pitch was hit for a home run by Connor Wong in the sixth inning, putting the Red Sox ahead 4-0.
Pre-Game Insights: Manager A.J. Hinch mentioned that Mize was good at times but also misfired at times.
Jake Rogers told Mize to keep attacking and trust his stuff after one inning.
Post-Match Reflections: Mize acknowledged that he wanted to be better and that the homer would keep him up tonight.
The Tigers lost 7-5 in extra innings, their second straight loss after charging up the wild-card standings.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mize's fastball velocity was down, averaging only 93.8 mph compared to his season average of 95.6 mph.
The game's defining image was Mize, hands on head, watching as a mistake in an 0-2 count against his penultimate batter left the park.
